summary: Adds a small Dwemer themed house just outside of Riverwood
descriptionHtml:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Introduction

This is my first mod and first time using the Creation Kit, any and all feedback will be greatly appreciated and I'll be sure to keep on adding improvement and suggestions to the house if people seem to like it.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Description

This mod adds a small Dwemer themed house just outside of Riverwood (on your way to Whiterun) where you will find a small bridge leading to the house. The outside has a chopping block and an anvil on one side and a fishing pole and fish on the other. As for the inside, I tried to make it as cozy as I could, there is plenty of light and (Tavern) music to make it feel more homey.

Check the change log (just below) to see what has been added & removed.

I also tried to fill up the house without too much clutter so if you feel something is missing just message me and I'll see if I could add it in any way.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Updates/Change Logs

v.03
Released

v.06
Added (Exterior):
- Workbench
- Storage Chest
- Axe (Chopping Block)
- Bedroll
- Tanning Rack
- 2 Lanterns
- Misc Clutter

v.11
Added (Exterior):
- Fences
- Bridge Supports
Removed (Exterior):
- Bridge Support
* Slightly changed the position of the house

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation

NMM - Just click "Download with Manager" and you should be fine.

Manual - Download the file and drop it in your data file (steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uninstalling

NMM - Uninstall using the Mod Manager's uninstall button

Manual - Remove the files with you installed from your data file.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Permission

Feel free to edit and/or change my mod and re upload it just leave me a message and give credit to the original creator (me).

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Improvements

Like I said, feedback would be great if you wish something to be added. I am new to modding but I will try my best to improve the home in anyway I could.
author: SoosTM
